DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of accuracy and reliability of 2D and 3D measurements of the spine and lower limbs in adults based on biplanar radiographs with MicroDose protocol compared to a standard dose protocol
DOC.brief_title: Measurements Of Lower Limbs And Spine Based On Biplanar Radiographs: Microdose Compared To Standard Dose Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation of accuracy and reliability of 2D and 3D measurements of the spine and lower limbs in adults based on biplanar radiographs with MicroDose protocol compared to a standard dose protocol Part 1: retrospective evaluation of 50 patients: lower limb images with MicroDose protocol and lower limb images with standard dose protocol Part 2: prospective evaluation of 100 patients: lower limb images with MicroDose protocol and lower limb images with standard dose protocol Part 3: prospective evaluation of 150 patients: spine images with MicroDose protocol and spine limb images with standard dose protocol
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: All patients referred for biplanar radiographs of spine and lower limb (from 18 to 99 years of age) Exclusion criteria: no informed consent
